topic.title: Three Typical E-X-P-A-N-D-E-D Systems
topic.shortdesc: Information on the three sets of standard expansion configurations available for the TRS-80.

section.title: 4K "EDUCATOR" System
section.p: The "EDUCATOR" System includes our screen printer for a "hard copy" computing system useful in keeping track of household records and point-of-sale receipts. In addition, the "EDUCATOR" is ideally suited for computer-assisted instruction programs.

section.title: 16K "PROFESSIONAL" System
section.p: "PROFESSIONAL" System offers 16K RAM, mini-disk system, and a screen printer for applications in science and engineering, clinical laboratories, statistical analysis, and software development. A major plus of this is its potential to eliminate expensive "on-line" costs.

section.title: 32K "BUSINESS" SYSTEM
section.p: A line printer and two mini-disk units are featured in the "BUSINESS" System. Possible applications include general ledger and payroll, accounts receivable/accounts payable, inventory control, mailing lists, sales and market analysis, and use in medical and dental offices.
